greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of (Sum_{d|n} sigma(d)) / sigma(n).
example: For n = 4; a(4) = numerator((Sum_{d|4} sigma(d)) / sigma(4)) = numerator((1 + 3 + 7) / (1 + 2 + 4)) = numerator(11/7) = 11.
mathematica: Table[Numerator[Sum[DivisorSigma[1, d], {d, Divisors[n]}] / DivisorSigma[1, n]], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Dec 22 2018 *)
program: (MAGMA) [Numerator(&+[SumOfDivisors(d): d in Divisors(n)] /  SumOfDivisors(n)): n in [1..1000]]
(PARI) a(n) = numerator(sumdiv(n, d, sigma(d))/sigma(n)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 22 2018
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Dec 22 2018
